perturbation.original_text:
1.7 “Products” shall mean the products offered by JRVS for sale to the Distributor; the Products shall include iMine cryptocurrency mining rigs and its parts and components.

2.1 Appointment of Nonexclusive Distributor. Subject to the terms and conditions of this Agreement, JRVS appoints the
Distributor, and the Distributor hereby accepts such appointment, as JRVS’S non-exclusive authorized distributor for sale of the
Products to the Customers (other than House Account) in the Territory (as these terms are defined in Section 1.8, above). Under
no circumstances shall Distributor sell Products for use outside the Territory.
perturbation.changed_text:
1.7 “Products” shall mean the products offered by JRVS for sale to the Distributor; the Products shall include iMine cryptocurrency mining rigs and its parts and components. However, JRVS reserves the right to exclude certain products or product categories from this definition at any time with written notice to the distributor.

2.1 Appointment of Nonexclusive Distributor. Subject to the terms and conditions of this Agreement, JRVS appoints the Distributor, and the Distributor hereby accepts such appointment, as JRVS’S non-exclusive authorized distributor for sale of the Products to the Customers (other than House Account) in the Territory (as these terms are defined in Section 1.8, above). Under no circumstances shall Distributor sell Products for use outside the Territory. Notwithstanding the above, JRVS may, at its sole discretion, permit the Distributor to sell specific Products outside the Territory under separately negotiated terms.
perturbation.explanation: The original text clearly defines 'Products' and appoints the distributor to sell those products within the territory. The modified version introduces a contradiction. First, it allows JRVS to exclude certain products from the definition of 'Products' after the agreement has been made, creating uncertainty about what the distributor is actually authorized to sell. Second, it allows for sales outside the territory under separately negotiated terms, directly contradicting the original restriction and creating ambiguity about the distributor's territorial rights.

perturbation.original_text:
10.1 Sole Warranty. THE SOLE WARRANTY, IF ANY, PROVIDED IN CONNECTION WITH THE PRODUCT SHALL BE PROVIDED BY THE COMPONENT MANUFACTURER. JRVS MAKES NO WARRANTIES TO THE DISTRIBUTOR OR CUSTOMERS.
10.2 Warranty Period. JRVS shall NOT provide a warranty of any kind for each of the Products against defects in material and workmanship under normal use and service from the date of delivery to the Distributor.
10.3 No Other Warranty. EXCEPT AS EXPRESSLY PROVIDED IN THIS SECTION 10, JRVS PROVIDES NO WARRANTY, EXPRESS, IMPLIED, STATUTORY, OR OTHERWISE, AND SPECIFICALLY DISCLAIMS ANY WARRANTY OF MERCHANTABILITY OR FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE, WITH RESPECT TO THE PRODUCT AND DOCUMENTATION.
perturbation.changed_text:
10.1 Sole Warranty. THE SOLE WARRANTY, IF ANY, PROVIDED IN CONNECTION WITH THE PRODUCT SHALL BE PROVIDED BY THE COMPONENT MANUFACTURER. JRVS MAKES NO WARRANTIES TO THE DISTRIBUTOR OR CUSTOMERS, except as stated in Section 10.2.
10.2 Warranty Period. JRVS warrants that the Products will conform to JRVS’s specifications at the time of delivery to the Distributor, for a period of thirty (30) days from the date of delivery. This warranty is limited to the replacement of defective Products.
10.3 No Other Warranty. EXCEPT AS EXPRESSLY PROVIDED IN THIS SECTION 10, JRVS PROVIDES NO WARRANTY, EXPRESS, IMPLIED, STATUTORY, OR OTHERWISE, AND SPECIFICALLY DISCLAIMS ANY WARRANTY OF MERCHANTABILITY OR FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE, WITH RESPECT TO THE PRODUCT AND DOCUMENTATION. The warranty provided in section 10.2 is in lieu of all other warranties.
perturbation.explanation: The original section explicitly states that JRVS provides no warranties. The modified version introduces a limited warranty in Section 10.2, directly contradicting the no-warranty statement in Section 10.1. This creates confusion about whether JRVS provides any warranty at all, and if so, what the terms of that warranty are. Furthermore, stating that the new limited warranty is "in lieu of all other warranties" exacerbates the confusion instead of clarifying.

perturbation.original_text:
5.1 JRVS Price. Subject to the terms and conditions of this Agreement, the Distributor shall pay for the Products at the then current price of JRVS (the “JRVS Price”) at the time of placement of the Order.
5.2 Price Change. JRVS shall have the right to revise JRVS Price at any time. Price changes shall apply to all purchase orders received after the effective date with the notice, except that any price increase shall be effective immediately upon notice to Distributor and apply to those accepted but undelivered orders.
perturbation.changed_text:
5.1 JRVS Price. Subject to the terms and conditions of this Agreement, the Distributor shall pay for the Products at the then current price of JRVS (the “JRVS Price”) at the time of placement of the Order. The JRVS Price shall be fixed for the duration of this agreement.
5.2 Price Change. JRVS shall have the right to revise JRVS Price at any time. Price changes shall apply to all purchase orders received after the effective date with the notice, except that any price increase shall be effective immediately upon notice to Distributor and apply to those accepted but undelivered orders. The distributor may not refuse the price change.
perturbation.explanation: The modified section 5.1 declares that "the JRVS Price shall be fixed for the duration of this agreement." while section 5.2 states that "JRVS shall have the right to revise JRVS Price at any time." This is a direct contradiction regarding JRVS's ability to change the price of the product. Adding "The distributor may not refuse the price change" to the end of section 5.2 simply enhances this conflict and clarifies JRVS's decision to change the price, which is not compatible with the original price.
